bibl.title: Life in Egypt under Roman Rule.
bibl.seg: Lewis Naphtali, Life in Egypt under Roman Rule.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1983, 8°, x-240 pp., 2 cartes et 8 pll.

C.R. par Geneviève Husson, REG 62 (1984) pp. 520-522. - G.A. Paterson, G&R 31 (1984) pp. 91-92. - P.J. Sijpesteijn, TG 97 (1984) pp. 581-582. - Jean A. Straus, BibO 42 (1985) coll. 632-633. - M.L. Astarita, Orpheus 5 (1984) pp. 242-244. - Michel Dubuisson, Latomus 44 (1985) pp. 900. - Jane Rowlandson CR N.S., 35 (1985) pp. 140-141. - Alan R. Schulman, CW 78 (1985) p. 229. - I.F. Fichman, Byzantinoslavica 48 (1987) pp. 67-69. - Livia Migliardi Zingale, Iura 34 (1983) pp. 210-212. - S.R. Pickering, Ancient Society. Resources for Teachers 15 (1985) pp. 169-171. - Jacques Schwartz, REA 86 (1984) pp. 345-346. - Alain Martin, ChrEg 58 (1983) Nos 115-116, pp. 271-273 (donne la liste des documents traduits). - F. Urcelay, Helmantica 35 (1984) p. 311. - Heinz Heinen, Gnomon 61 (1989) pp. 176-178 et Gymnasium 95 (1988) pp. 460-461. - Fr. Lourenço, Euphrosyne 16 (1988) pp. 476-477. - Brian C. McGing, Hermathena 144 (1988) pp. 114-117.
